615710.name: Fantasy Grounds - NPCs: Nobles (Token Pack)
615710.description:
NPCs: The Middle Class

This token pack contains 43 tokens. This pack contains an assortment of non player characters of Noble standing.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 2 Female Courtesans
  • 2 Female High Priestesses
  • Female Knight
  • 5 Female Musicians
  • 3 Female Nobles
  • Female Noble Dancer
  • 2 Female Nobles Elders
  • 2 Female Nobles Sitting
  • 2 Female Nobles Sleeping
  • 2 Female Queens
  • Male Advisor
  • Male Fop
  • 3 Male Guards
  • 2 Male Kings
  • Male List Keeper
  • Male Lord
  • Male Master Cook
  • Male Noble Elder Drinking
  • 2 Male Noble Merchants
  • Male Noble Older
  • 2 Male Nobles Sitting
  • 2 Male Nobles Sleeping
  • 2 male Nobles
  • Male 'The Black Count'
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
